pullrequest.title: Initial test of device_properties BLACS_tab widgets for the PylonCamera device.

content.raw: Oops. Looks like my last commit didn’t make it to the jump drive that added the example enum control. I’ll try to upload it tomorrow for completeness.
content.html: Oops. Looks like my last commit didn’t make it to the jump drive that added the example enum control. I’ll try to upload it tomorrow for completeness.

pullrequest.title: Initial test of device_properties BLACS_tab widgets for the PylonCamera device.

content.raw: Finally uploaded the enum test commit. Also fixed the worker so it can actually return the current attributes when using a mock camera. This should allow anyone to test these UI changes using the mock instantiation kwarg.
content.html: Finally uploaded the enum test commit. Also fixed the worker so it can actually return the current attributes when using a mock camera. This should allow anyone to test these UI changes using the mock instantiation kwarg.

pullrequest.title: Initial test of device_properties BLACS_tab widgets for the PylonCamera device.

content.raw:
Similarly to the other device\_properties PR, I think this one will need to be re-created once we are on github \(we can do that, if you don’t\). There will also be messy changes as we move files without repos into a more standard Python package layout, which will cause more of a pain in the neck.

I’m not sure how happy I am with the underlying implementation of device properties, so I’ll need to give it a bit more thought, I think there might be better ways to go about it. Nonetheless let’s recreate this PR and continue \(slowly\) thinking about it on the other side.
content.html:
Similarly to the other device_properties PR, I think this one will need to be re-created once we are on github (we can do that, if you don’t). There will also be messy changes as we move files without repos into a more standard Python package layout, which will cause more of a pain in the neck.

I’m not sure how happy I am with the underlying implementation of device properties, so I’ll need to give it a bit more thought, I think there might be better ways to go about it. Nonetheless let’s recreate this PR and continue (slowly) thinking about it on the other side.

pullrequest.title: Initial test of device_properties BLACS_tab widgets for the PylonCamera device.

content.raw: All sounds good to me. I haven’t thought about this for a little while so when I recreate hopefully it can get a fresh coat of paint as well.
content.html: All sounds good to me. I haven’t thought about this for a little while so when I recreate hopefully it can get a fresh coat of paint as well.
